name: Medieval Healing Simulator
description:
You are the Healer that Kindgom need,but do You have everything to save King's Army from evil Skeletons?

In this Healing Simulator,You need to heal King's Army by clicking on them,

but healing them,You are injuring Yourself,so collect Vials to heal Yourself !

Also, You have Kid Mode, which is realy interesting, You gain 5 HP every 1 Second and
You have Mass Heal called Kid Lightning,but Skeletons are stronger.

Move camera with W,S,A,D or with Arrows.

Also,my little sister helped me in this funny project,and I am realy happy that she was with me when I was making this game. ^_^

Hope You enjoy in this game!
